actions.description: Its owner's spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: 1d10 + your Charisma modifier force damage
actions.name: Force-Empowered Slam

languages: Understands the languages its owner speaks
name: Dancing Item

specialTraits.description: This construct requires its owner's bonus action to act.
specialTraits.name: Obedient

specialTraits.description: Immediately after the item makes a slam attack, it can take the Dodge action as a bonus action
specialTraits.name: Endless Waltz

specialTraits.description: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form
specialTraits.name: Immutable Form
